EmailTemplate.description: Send to customers on leads that have been sitting for approximately two weeks as of 8/2/2016.
EmailTemplate.name: Protec Delay in Sample Letter to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Here’s an update regarding your FREE Tyvek Protec sample roll
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your interest in Tyvek ® Protec™ roofing underlayments! We have received your request for a free sample roll and are in the process of getting it to you in the next few weeks.
While you are awaiting to experience this exciting new product from DuPont, we invite you to learn more at tyvek.com/protec:
• Why use Tyvek® Protect™ on your next project • Learn more about the portfolio • Warranty Protection
Please call 1-800-44-TYVEK if you have any questions in the meantime.
Thank you, DuPont™ Tyvek® Customer Care Team
